title: My special family
creator_credit: Erin Wilson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. From her family, Erin has learnt responsibility, empathy, the realities of life and death and, most importantly, love and friendship. Here she pays tribute to the members of this special family.
